meanings.sent1: I insolubilized the sugar by adding too much water.
meanings.sent2: The chemist insolubilized the powder by mixing it with oil.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy scientist accidentally insolubilized the solution by spilling a sticky substance into it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination insolubilized any doubts that she would succeed.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion insolubilized the curse, breaking its hold on the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The insolubilized tablet remained solid in the water.
meanings.sent2: The rock was insolubilized in the strong acid.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn stain on the shirt seemed insolubilized, resisting all attempts at removal.
meanings.sent4: His unwavering faith was like an insolubilized anchor in the storm of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was so insolubilized that it seemed to defy the laws of nature.
